GSD.product_version: versions from v3.8 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
ASoC: atmel: Add missing of_node_put() in at91sam9g20ek_audio_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit a0bc36b247dcf4d21bf820bfc4bcbaf7f6cf19b5, it was introduced in version v3.8 by commit 531f67e41dcde1e358cf821d056241a66355cf03. For more details please see the references link.
